articles.title: Elsa brings heavy rain, power outages to Maritimes - CTV News Atlantic
articles.description: Drenching rain and blustery winds from post tropical storm Elsa belted the Maritimes overnight, resulting in widespread power outages in some areas.
articles.content:
HALIFAX -- 
Power has been restored to thousands of homes across the Maritimes after rain and high winds from post tropical storm Elsa blew through the area causing widespread outages.
